intro.p: Validate that the property is not null or empty (for strings)

section.title: ValidateNotEmptyAttribute()
section.p: Initializes a new instance of the Castle.ActiveRecord.ValidateNotEmptyAttribute class.

section.title: ValidateNotEmptyAttribute(String errorMessage)
section.p: Initializes a new instance of the Castle.ActiveRecord.ValidateNotEmptyAttribute class.

tr.td: Gets the validator for this attribute. Each attribute that inherits from this class will have its own validtor.
